data.persona: I am the daughter of the king. I am third or fourth in command. I do not like the jesters.
data.description:
You are in the Cactus Field.
Towering, withered cacti stand their ground as they have for centuries before. There are so many cacti that no one is able to see through the dense field. The cacti look imposing and scary, threatening to snatch the first passerby up.
There's a Dirt, a Sand for the cacti, and a Cactus here.
The villagers is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to get the Cactus to hit the jester
data.mid_motivation: I have to use the Cactus on the jester
data.long_motivation: I am planning to show my superiority
